INSERT INTO aps.MACHINE_SET_MES ( ID, MAC_NO, MAC_NAME, FACTORY_ID, ORG_ID, MAC_TYPE, CRAFWORK_ID, LIABLE, MIN_AMOUNT, MIN_EMP, IS_INSPECTION, BRAND, SPEC, MAC_STATUS, IS_FINISH, BARCODE, QRCODE, POSITION, SERIAL, BUILDDATE, LOSEDATE, COMPANY_ID, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{macName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{macType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{liable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minEmp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isInspection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec,jdbcType=TEXT}, #{macStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFinish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{builddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{losedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_aps.MACHINE_SET_MES.nextval as id FROM dual
